post.body: Not yet. I have been so busy this week. Will do probably tomorrow. Can I use your name, so you can get the credit?
Thats sound good too. I just need to finish the heavy cream....
alpacas are the best :)
Love your blog. Always intersting :)
Love your yarn :)
I have purchaed one, less than $30. My best investment. Pictures looks much better. Good Luck!
Thats a new one:)
I want to join. Can i use you as reference, so you can get the credit?
That's nice. So there is a light somewhere in the tunnel :):):)
Love your hats. The mushroom hat is very interesting :)
Want to see pictures :) Congrat for winning the hugh green skein :)
Any wool, merino will be good to start with. Draft it good, it will make it all easier.
If you like it, upgrade to a wheel. I have a wheel, and still using my spindle. Specialy, when DH is driving :)
Can't figure out what to cook for tomorrow's lunch... Alfredo Chicken???
Tweets... Any New year plans???
Coffee does not help this morning...
so glad holidays are allmost over.
The kids are comming over tomorrow. It is going to be a fun day ....
a great link to find out if your etsy shop was featured - http://www.subsushi.net/featsy/
Bamboo and Silk are very slippery, so these will be more chalenging, but very pretty.
